body:
So let me get this straight getting trolled  didn't make me quit
getting banned 200mill times  gets you  so pissed :(
im sorry to announce but i am leaving for 12 years
Thanks to:
Rockyyyy
Precise_
Murphh
Junr
you  guys always made me happy when im sad  and you guys were so kind to me and in other words The best friends i ever had
Best staff :
so the staff were always  crap and mean but i always  have a favourite one :):
Junr
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdWo_2YznJULVbosF-vM1qw
bye avicus
but i have one more thing i will post
today there will be a pro animation b y me  out today

title: I quit // banned
